column4: do you have a 32 or 64 bit processor? also 4gb of ram or more you want 64 bit
im not sure if it doesnt recognize beyond 4gb of ram or if it just uses up to 4 gb of ram on 32 bit
you can use more than 4GB or ram on 32bit if a PAE kernel is installed
as acicula says, some hardware can't do that though
